description: Greater of amicable pair of Euler's first form with GCD a prime times a power of 2.
comments: The sequence is ordered first on the common power of 2, then on size of the number. More entries can be found in the reference.
references: Mariano Garcia, New Amicable Pairs of Euler's First Form with Greatest Common Factor a Prime Times a Power of 2, Nieuw Arch. Wisk 17(1999), pp. 25-27
author: _Floor van Lamoen_
